issue.title: [Python] Add tests to verify that one can build a C++ extension against the manylinux1 wheels
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9033](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9033). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Some project want to be able to use the Python wheels to build other Python packages with C++ extensions that need to link against libarrow.so. It would be great if someone would add automated tests to ensure that our wheel builds can be used successfully in this fashion.
